dc_title_s: Old Boston, compiled from the Book of possessions
dc_description_s: Date of situation approximately 1640.; Cadastral map showing property owners.; Relief shown by hachures.; Oriented with north to the upper right.; Includes sheet index and list of property owners.; Photo negative photocopy.|157 x 257 Centimeters, sheets 89 x 66 Centimeters|Scale approximately 1:1,100|City Maps
dc_publisher_s: Trustees of the Boston Public Library (Boston)
